items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. The app integrates with the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch accurate weather details, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, cloud coverage, and sunrise/sunset times
items.title: giovannifdipasquale/weather_fetch: weather_fetch is a lightweight React application that allows users to retrieve real-time weather data for any city worldwide. items.content_html: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.
items.title: LaithMahdi/example_hono_drizzle_orm_supabase: This is a sample project demonstrating how to build a RESTful API using Hono (a fast and lightweight web framework) and Supabase (a backend-as-a-service platform). The project uses Drizzle ORM for database interactions and Zod for schema validation.
